src:
IHSG Merah, Dolar AS Hijau ke Level Rp 14.055
01 Nov 2019, 02:35 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.055. Demikian dikutip dari data perdagangan Reuters, Jumat (1/11/2019).Angka ini tercatat lebih tinggi dibanding posisi penutupan perdagangan pada Kamis kemarin yang ada di level Rp 14.032. Hingga pagi pukul 09.30 WIB, dolar AS tercatat bergerak di rentang Rp 14.042-14.067.Dolar AS dalam dua pekan terakhir tercatat bergerak stabil di bawah level Rp 14.100. Secara point to point dibandingkan setahun yang lalu, mata uang Paman Sam bergerak di rentang Rp 13.885-15.198.Dari data RTI, dolar AS pagi ini tercatat naik 28 poin (0,2%). Nilai tukar dolar AS terhadap rupiah berada di level Rp 14.065.Rupiah, dolar Taiwan, dan baht Thailand tercatat menjadi mata uang yang paling kuat ditekan dolar AS pagi ini. Sebaliknya, pagi ini mata uang yang gagal diungguli dolar AS adalah dolar Selandia Baru, won Korsel, dan dolar Australia.Setali tiga uang dengan IHSG yang bergerak negatif, rupiah pagi ini terpukul terhadap mayoritas mata uang negara utama dunia. Rupiah paling kuat ditekan oleh dolar Selandia Baru, dolar Australia, dan poundsterling.Simak Video "Pilpres Takkan Pengaruhi Nilai Tukar Rupiah di Semester I 2019"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)
text:
JCI Red, US Dollar Green to the level of Rp 14,055
Nov 01 2019, 02:35 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning is at the level of Rp 14,055. As quoted from Reuters trade data, Friday (11/01/2019). This figure was recorded higher than the closing position of trade on Thursday which was at the level of Rp 14,032. Until the morning at 09.30 West Indonesia Time, the US dollar was recorded moving in the range of Rp. 14,042-14,067. The US dollar in the last two weeks was recorded to be stable below the level of Rp. 14,100. On a point-to-point basis compared to a year ago, Uncle Sam's currency moved in the range of Rp 13,885-15,198. From RTI data, the US dollar this morning recorded an increase of 28 points (0.2%). The exchange rate of the US dollar against the rupiah is at the level of Rp 14,065. The rupiah, the Taiwan dollar and the Thai baht are the strongest currencies pressed by the US dollar this morning. On the contrary, this morning the currencies that failed to outperform the US dollar were the New Zealand dollar, South Korean won, and the Australian dollar. Three of the money with the JCI moving negatively, the rupiah this morning was hit against the majority of the world's major currencies. The Rupiah was most strongly suppressed by the New Zealand dollar, the Australian dollar and the pound. Watch Video "Presidential Election Will Not Affect Rupiah Exchange Rates in Semester I 2019" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / eds)
